title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 423.6 - Records and reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 423.6 - Records and reports

State Regulations
(a) A written manual of program policies and
procedures shall be maintained by each approved agency. (b) Each approved preventive services agency
must comply with Part 428 and sections
430.8
-430.13, 431.15 and 441.21
of this Title. (c) All children and
their families receiving preventive services must be entered onto the child
care review service. Furthermore, an accurate and timely record of actions
taken on behalf of these children and families must be maintained on such
service. Preventive services provided to children and their families who are
not entered into the child care review service will not be reimbursed by the
department. Each preventive services agency must conform to all applicable
requirements of the child care review service set forth in section
440
through
445
of the

Social Services Law. (d) Each
approved preventive services agency shall furnish all information, statistics, records and reports relating to its operation to the department in such form
and at such time as the department may determine necessary. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
423.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
